Package net.sf.nsisant

Class Summary
Define Represents an NSIS definition in the context of the build script.
Scriptcmd Represents an NSIS command to execute in the context of the build script.
Task This task allows an NSIS script to be compiled using Ant.
Verbosity Enumerated attribute for the verbosity attribute of the task.
